title: Urban tree cover provides consistent mitigation of extreme heat in arid but not humid cities.
content:
Publication date: Available online 17 July 2024

Source: Sustainable Cities and Society

Author(s): Peter C. Ibsen, Benjamin R. Crawford, Lucila Corro, Kenneth J. Bagstad, Brandon E. McNellis, George D. Jenerette, Jay E. Diffendorfer
